publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4129.1 Margaret Smith: Edinburgh Tram (Line One) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4129) in the name of Jackie Baillie, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "does not agree that the Edinburgh Tram (Line One) Bill be passed because the tram route does not directly service the Western General Hospital."
